Package com.riskgame.model

Class ConquestMap

java.lang.Object
com.riskgame.model.MapAdapter
com.riskgame.model.ConquestMap
public class ConquestMap extends MapAdapter
ConquestMap class is the adapter class for reading and saving domination map
